body:
Dear All,


FYI


IIT Building Energy Seminar-7
:  BIM-based Energy & Building Performance Analysis
(Green Building Studio, ECOTECT & eQUEST)


Website: http://www.iit.edu/arch/events/2010/energy_seminar_7.shtml


Early registration deadline: Oct 1 ($200)
Unemployed Architect/Engineer: $150
Regular $300
Faculty member $150
Full-time student $80




Dates: One-day Seminar, Oct 11, Monday
Location: Illinois Institute of Technology, Chicago
3410 S. State Street, Chicago IL 60616


Schedule
Morning – BIM-based Energy & Building Performance Analysis
08:30 – 09:00 Registration and Opening Remark
09:00 – 10:15 BIM and Sustainability – GBS, ECOTECT, eQUEST
10:30 – 11:40 What is Green Building XML?
; How to use it for BIM, Green Building Studio, ECOTECT and eQUEST


Afternoon – Autodesk ECOTECT 2011 & Green Building Studio
12:45 – 13:45 ECOTECT’s tool (Weather Tool, Solar Tool)
13:45 – 15:00 Solar Analysis, Shading & Shadow Analysis, Sun-path Diagram
15:15 – 16:00 Solar Radiation
16:00 – 17:00 Daylighting Analysis
___
